# Select input

```{r select-input}
selectInput(
  inputId = 'ExampleDropDown',
  label = "Please make a selection",
  choices = list('Value 1' = 1,
                 'Value 2' = 2,
                 'Value 3' = 3)
  )

```

```{r print-select-input}
renderPrint(input$ExampleDropDown)
```
